short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically opens specified URLs in incognito mode.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description:
Open specific URLs in incognito mode automatically with the "Incognito URL Opener" extension. Keep your browsing private and secure with this convenient tool.

Features:

Define a list of URLs that should automatically open in incognito mode.
Customize the extension options through the easy-to-use interface.
Seamlessly open matching URLs in new incognito windows with a single click.

How it Works:
Install the extension and access the options page.
Add URLs to the list that you want to open in incognito mode.
Browse the web, and the extension will automatically handle specified URLs in incognito mode.

Support Development:
Consider supporting the development of this extension by making a donation. Your contribution helps us continue to improve and maintain this tool for a better browsing experience.

Privacy Note:
This extension respects your privacy. It only opens specified URLs in incognito mode without collecting any personal information.

Feedback:
We appreciate your feedback! If you encounter any issues or have suggestions for improvement, please reach out to us.

Thank you for using "Incognito URL Opener "!
